article_title: Melissa McCarthy and Susan Sarandon provide 'Tammy's' comic fuel
article_text:
Just One More Thing...

og.description: Small favors, but in “Tammy” we have a less grating road-trip comedy than ”Identity Thief,” the one Melissa McCarthy did with Jason Bateman, and a more deliberately heartwarming vehicle than ”The Heat,” featuring McCarthy and Sandra Bullock.
og.title: Melissa McCarthy and Susan Sarandon provide 'Tammy's' comic fuel
